#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
	int n;
	sc(n);
	while(n--){
	char a[15],b[10];
	scanf("%s%s",a,b);
	if(strstr(a,b)!=NULL)
	{
		pf(1);
	}
	else
	{
		pf(0);
	}}
	return 0;
}
